# api-analytics-setup-posthog

PostHog analytics and feature flags setup

## Tags

`posthog` `setup` `analytics` `feature-flags` `installation`

## Installation

Add this plugin to your Claude Code configuration:

```json
{
  "plugins": ["api-analytics-setup-posthog"]
}
```

## Usage

This skill is automatically available when installed.
